## Across Cycling Club Munich

ACC was founded in 2023 as a community for Chinese cycling enthusiasts in the Munich area.

### Our Vision

1. **Make our members happy** - Sense of belonging and fun
2. **Spread cycling culture** - Get more people involved
3. **Set the standard** - Pioneer of Chinese cycling in Europe
4. **Be a cycling host** - Support cyclists visiting Europe
